item.title: Principles
item.description: HIPO is being developed with 2 main principles in mind: ez2use & ez2dev HIPO is aimed to researchers without any IT or programming background. This means that the toolset must be as easy to install, setup and use as possible. At the same time, HIPO is being developed actively by one single person (José Verdú Díaz), which limits the amount of work that can be made. Furthermore, this project shall focus on creating new and useful features as actively as possible.

item.title: Install
item.description: You will need Python and some modules to use HIPO. If you are not an experienced user you will find detailed instructions in the Environment section. Otherwise, feel free to jump to the Source Code section. Environment It is recommended to use Conda for installing Python and the required modules. From Conda documentation: Conda is an open source package management system and environment management system that runs on Windows, macOS and Linux.
